00008 /*********************************************************************
00009                 Receives the processing of an ack   
00010 *********************************************************************/
00011 
00012 void
00013 tcp_layer_process_ack_rc(tcp_layer_state *SV,  tw_bf *CV, rn_message *msg, tw_lp *lp)
00014 {
00015   int i; 
00016   int ack;
00017   tcp_layer_message    *M;
00018   // printf("%f roll ack %d %d lp %d\n",tw_now(lp), SV->unack, M->ack, lp->id);
00019  
00020   
00021   M = rn_message_data(msg);
00022   
00023   if(CV->c2)
00024     {
00025       for(i=0; i<M->seq_num; i++)
00026         {
00027           //  tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->id);
00028           SV->seq_num -= g_tcp_layer_mss; 
00029           SV->sent_packets--;
00030         }
00031       
00032       // reverse tcp_update_rtt 
00033       if(CV->c5 || CV->c7)
00034         {
00035           
00036           SV->rtt_seq = M->RC.rtt_seq; 
00037           // M->RC.rtt_seq = SV->rtt_seq;
00038           //SV->rtt_seq = M->ack;  // wrong CHANGE
00039           SV->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00040           
00041           if(CV->c6 && CV->c5)
00042             SV->rto = M->dest;
00043           SV->rto_seq--;
00044           
00045           if(CV->c13){
00046             tcp_layer_message *M1;
00047             rn_message *msg1;
00048             
00049             if(SV->timer)
00050               tw_timer_reset(lp, &(SV->timer), M->RC.timer_ts);
00051             else
00052               SV->timer = tw_timer_init(lp, M->RC.timer_ts);
00053             
00054             msg1 = tw_event_data(SV->timer);
00055             M1 = rn_message_data(msg1);
00056             M1->seq_num = M->RC.timer_seq;
00057             M1->source = M->source;
00058             M1->MethodName = RTO;
00059           }
00060         }
00061 
00062       
00063     
00064     // Reverse tcp_update_cwnd
00065     if(CV->c3 || CV->c4)
00066       SV->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd; 
00067   
00068     ack = SV->unack;
00069     SV->unack = M->ack;
00070     M->ack = ack - g_tcp_layer_mss;
00071     SV->dup_count = M->RC.dup_count;
00072     if(CV->c9)
00073       SV->seq_num = M->RC.seq_num;
00074   }
00075   else 
00076     {
00077       if(CV->c3)
00078         {
00079           SV->dup_count -= 1;
00080           if(CV->c4)
00081             {
00082               
00083               SV->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00084               SV->rtt_seq  = M->RC.seq_num;//SV->unack; //big CHANGE 
00085               //SV->timedout_packets--;
00086               //SV->sent_packets--;
00087               
00088               SV->rto_seq--;
00089               
00090               SV->seq_num = M->ack;
00091               M->ack = SV->unack - g_tcp_layer_mss;
00092               
00093               SV->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd;
00094               SV->ssthresh = M->dest;
00095 
00096               
00097               if(CV->c13){
00098                 //rn_message *msg1;
00099                 tcp_layer_message *M1;
00100                 if(SV->timer)
00101                   tw_timer_reset(lp, &(SV->timer), M->RC.timer_ts);
00102                 else
00103                   SV->timer = tw_timer_init(lp, M->RC.timer_ts);
00104                 M1 = tw_event_data(SV->timer);
00105                 M1->seq_num = M->RC.timer_seq;
00106                 M1->source = M->source;
00107                 M1->MethodName = RTO;
00108               }
00109             }
00110         }
00111     }
00112 }

00115 /*********************************************************************
00116                Receives the processing of data packet
00117 *********************************************************************/
00118 
00119 void
00120 tcp_layer_process_data_rc(tcp_layer_state *SV,  tw_bf *CV, rn_message *msg, tw_lp *lp)
00121 {
00122   tcp_layer_message    *M;
00123   M = rn_message_data(msg);
00124 
00125   if(CV->c2)
00126     {
00127       // tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->id);
00128       SV->received_packets--;
00129       SV->seq_num -= g_tcp_layer_mss;
00130       while(M->RC.dup_count){
00131         SV->out_of_order[(SV->seq_num / (int) g_tcp_layer_mss) % g_tcp_layer_recv_wnd ] = 1;
00132         SV->seq_num -= g_tcp_layer_mss;
00133         M->RC.dup_count--;
00134       }
00135     }
00136   else
00137     {
00138       if(CV->c3){
00139         if(CV->c4) {} // need to think about this one  WILL NOT WORK UNTILL YOU FIX!!!!!
00140         else
00141           SV->out_of_order[(M->seq_num / (int) g_tcp_layer_mss) % g_tcp_layer_recv_wnd] = 0;
00142       }
00143     }
00144 }

00147 /*********************************************************************
00148                  Receives the processing of a timeout    
00149 *********************************************************************/
00150 
00151 void 
00152 tcp_layer_timeout_rc(tcp_layer_state *SV, tw_bf *CV, tcp_layer_message *M, tw_lp *lp)
00153 {
00154   int ssthresh = M->dest;
00155   int seq_num = M->ack; 
00156 
00157   
00158   if(CV->c1)
00159     {
00160       SV->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00161       SV->rtt_seq = M->RC.rtt_seq;//M->seq_num; CHANGE
00162       SV->rto_seq--;
00163       SV->timedout_packets--;
00164       //SV->sent_packets--;
00165       
00166       
00167       SV->rto = M->RC.dup_count;//SV->rto/2; //possible an error.
00168       SV->seq_num = seq_num;
00169       
00170       SV->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd;
00171       SV->ssthresh = ssthresh;
00172       
00173       tw_timer_cancel(lp, &(SV->timer));
00174       SV->timer = M->RC.timer;
00175     }
00176 }
